Description: International Petroleum Corporation of Delaware was sentenced by United States District Court Judge Gregory M. Sleet to a $1,300,000 fine and $2,200,000 restitution to the City of Wilmington for environmental crimes, including a conspiracy to violate the Clean Water Act.
Agency: Environmental Protection Agency referral to the Justice Department

Description: hostile work environment based on race, color, national origin and religion
Notes: Description field shows type of discrimination that EEOC had alleged.
